name: MEC Journey Organic Short Sleeve T-Shirt - Infants
description:
Stylish and unique, and a basic that works for kids who wear shirts.Made of organically grown cotton jersey.Name label inside.Contrasting panels on shoulders and arms.Back length is 24cm size 12mo, plus or minus 1cm for every size above or below.Silk screened graphic.
